channel.title: CamelK on Apache Camel
channel.description: Recent content in CamelK on Apache Camel

item.title: Camel K on CNCF Serverless Landscape
item.description: The Apache Camel K project is now listed on the CNCF (Cloud Native Computing Foundation) interactive landscape; which lists all known open source projects that works with kubernetes and cloud platforms. Camel K CNCF landscape (Click to enlarge)
